posts.extended: This officer seemed to be in charge, but apparently not in charge of keeping police vans from getting smashed.

posts.description: Twitter / mrejfox: I always try to get the na
posts.extended: I always try to get the names of officers w/ the shotguns. All of them I went up to covered their namebadges like so.
Another namebadge obscured because of the shotgun the officer is wielding. If anyone should be accountable it's them.
